projects.title: Redesigning My College's Covid Testing Process
projects.description: The old process left our health center understaffed and overstressed. So, I redesigned it and removed several key pain points to encourage greater usage from students.

projects.title: The Politics and Usability of Unemployment Insurance Websites
projects.description: I evaluated how usable all 50 state's unemployment website were and examined the possible predictors of it's quality. In the end, politics appears to influence usability.

projects.title: Automating a Workflow for Twitch Streamers
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.

projects.title: Personal Art Projects
projects.description: I primarily do graphic design and illustrations. Click to explore all of my art.
